​; 生物信息学疯狂的热汤米https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/326200-tutorial-how-cca-alignment-and-cell-label-transfer-work-in-seurat 质粒注释/作图https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/326171-plasmid-annotation-mapping Mon, 14 Oct 2024 17:56:59 GMT你好，这是我的第一篇文章。我有一个关于质粒的问题。我有一个显示 2 个重叠群的序列。我如何确定两个重叠群是否... Hello,
这是我的第一篇文章。

我有一个关于质粒的问题。我有一个显示 2 个重叠群的序列。我如何确定两个重叠群是否来自同一个质粒或者它们是否是两个不同的？; 生物信息学梅博卡https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/326171-plasmid-annotation-mapping 教程：如何轻松下载 GEO 元数据https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/326170-tutorial-how-to-download-geo-metadata-easily Mon, 14 Oct 2024 03:33:55 GMT你好，聊天组！我制作此视频是为了让您了解如何在 R 中下载 GEo 元数据 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NSoU58IqA3Y 快乐... Hello,

聊天经济学！我制作此视频是为了让您了解如何在 R 中下载 GEo 元数据

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NSoU58IqA3Y

快乐学习！
汤米; 生物信息学疯狂的热汤米https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/326170-tutorial-how-to-download-geo-metadata-easily 读取 Fastq 文件时出现 Trimmomatic 错误https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/326167-trimmomatic-error-reading-fastq-files Sat, 12 Oct 2024 17:29:24 GMT I'm trying to run Trimmomatic on some shotgun sequencing paired end files and while most of them are working (so I know the code isn't the problem),...I'm trying to run Trimmomatic on some shotgun sequencing paired end files and while most of them are working (so I know the code isn't the problem), a handful of files are unable to be run. I ran this code:

java -jar /scratch/g/jkirby/trimmomatic-0.39/trimmomatic-0.39.jar PE /scratch/g/jkirby/Landon_WGS_reanalysis/Figure_8/00_RAW_sequences/LTH2584Risp_108_R1.fastq.gz /scratch/g/jkirby/Landon_WGS_reanalysis/Figure_8/00_RAW _序列/LTH2584Risp_108_R2.fastq.gz /scratch/g/jkirby/Landon_WGS_reanalysis/mouse_removal/LTH2584Risp_108_trimmed_R1.fastq.gz /scratch/g/jkirby/Landon_WGS_reanalysis/mouse_removal/LTH2584Risp_108_untrimmed_ R1.fastq.gz /scratch/g/jkirby/Landon_WGS_reanalysis/mouse_removal/LTH2584Risp_108_trimmed_R2 .fastq.gz /scratch/g/jkirby/Landon_WGS_reanalysis/mouse_removal/LTH2584Risp_108_untrimmed_R2.fastq.gz ILLUMINACLIP:TruSeq3-PE.fa:2:30:10:2:True 前导:3 尾随:3 MINLEN:36

并不断从 Trimmomatic: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.RuntimeException: Invalid FASTQ name line中收到此错误：后面跟着一堆带有问号的黑色符号，长达数百（或可能数千）行。

第二个文件导致了类似的错误，但有问题的行完全不同：

线程“main”中的异常 java.lang.RuntimeException：无效的 FASTQ 注释行：GCCTCAGCTCCGGGATGTGCTTCATCAGATGGATAAAGGAATTTAGCCAAAGGCTACTTTTGTGGTGAACAGCGGGACAGGGTTGCATTTGAATTATGTCCAGACTCAGCCGGTTCCCATCTACACGCAGAACCAGCACTATCTGAAGGAG

显然错误出在 fastq 文件上，但我不确定是否有办法修复它们？; 生物信息学伊卡森https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/326167-trimmomatic-error-reading-fastq-files
